title: RADS error
body: fuck this I tried to download the patcher didn't work  kept restarting lol didn't work I thought fuck that so I uninstalled it and reinstalled it now I cant even open it cause of this RADS error if you have the same problem fuck riot

replies.body: This RADs error usually happens when your PC settings are blocking the patcher or client from either launching or scanning game files.  I suggest going over the steps in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to reconfigure your security settings to allow access.  If you have any other issues from there, let me know with as much detail as possible!
